long_description: Cold, blustery winter days on the trail or in town are no match for the windproof Seirus WINDSTOPPER(R) Blizzard gloves. Polyester/leather exteriors have WINDSTOPPER linings that eliminate windchill, yet remain breathable and quickly dissipate excess moisture to keep you dry and warm. Silicone grippers on the palms give you a good hold of ski poles and other equipment. Stretchy neoprene cuffs keep snow and cold air from getting in.
